STANDARD INSTRUMENTATION : A RANDOMIZED CLINICAL TRIAL COMPARING POSTOPERATIVE AXIAL ALIGNMENT COMPONENT POSITION - Short Title : Visionaire Alignment - Methodology : Monocentric , Single Blinded , Randomized Controlled Trial - Study Duration : November 2010 July 2014 - Study Centres : Leicester General Hospital , United Kingdom ( UK )
DOC.brief_title: Axial Alignment Patients Operated Using Visionaire Patient Matched Cutting Blocks
